description: This file defines the AttendanceScreen widget for a Flutter application, which manages and displays attendance data for students. It includes UI components, state management, and interactions with providers for loading, updating, and displaying attendance records.

classes.name: AttendanceScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying and managing student attendance, allowing date selection and attendance marking.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and loads attendance data for the current date.

methods.name: _loadAttendanceForDate
methods.description: Loads attendance data for the selected date via provider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the attendance screen including header, date display, and attendance list.

methods.name: _buildAttendanceCard
methods.description: Creates a card widget for each student showing attendance status.

methods.name: _buildAttendanceStatus
methods.description: Creates a dropdown menu to select attendance status for a student.

methods.name: _markAttendance
methods.description: Handles marking or updating a student's attendance record.

methods.name: _selectDate
methods.description: Displays date picker dialog for user to select attendance date.
